subject: Economy
question_en: What is the unemployment rate in India as of 2021?
question_hi: भारत में 2021 में क्या अंतर्गत लाभार्थीय विकास की संख्या है?
explanation_en: According to the latest data from the Ministry of Statistics and Programme Implementation, the unemployment rate in India was 17.2% in 2021.
